title: Laddu Laddu Lyrics Rajapattai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vikram, Andrea Jeremiah, Suchitra, Priyadarshini
Song: Laddu Laddu Rendu Laddu
Music: Yuvan
Movie : Rajapattai

Hey laddu laddu, rendu laddu
laddu laddu, rendu laddu
serndhu kedachale luck-e luck-e

Sukku na sukku malli, sundhari nadakira coffee
suda kothikaiyila soda yenathuku
Eduthu kudikavaa dosth-u dosth-u
idhukku edhuvum ila vaasthu vaasthu

Kuchi naan kuchi mittai, kumari naan panju mittai
besha irukaiyile pizza ennathuku
Indhaa eduthuko taste-u taste-u
innum thayanguna waste-u waste-u

laddu laddu, rendu laddu
serndhu kedachale luck-e luck-e
ottu ottu irikka ottu
vaari anachaale kick-e kick-e

Vadivel kanthanuku rendu peru jodi
avanga appaavukkum ullathudhaan podi
Adiye pombalaikum rendu veedu thaandi
adhula enna kutham vaaya pothi khodi

kaal-kaiyu rendu dhaan theva theva
kattunava rendu na bejaaru
Veedu vaasal rendu na ok ok
pondaattinga rendu yen ne kooru

Aasai meeruna alave illaye,
edhuku podura veli veli
paambu venuma? yeni venuma?
kuluki podava soli soli ... (laddu laddu ...)

Pagale illayana vanthiduma night-u
kavala venamuna vachukanum sight-u
Thavare ilayina onnum illa right-u
jaikka venumuna podanume fight-u

Suriyana pola naan otha aalu
vennilavu rendu na aagadhe
Thaamarai-ku thanni thaan kootu kootu
thanni vachhi paaichina thaangadhe

Edhayum thaanguven, ellam ketuko
pootuk kaakave saavi saavi
koora panjava, elavam panju nee
ilukka paakura koovi koovi

laddu laddu, rendu laddu
serndhu kedachale luck-e luck-e
ottu ottu irikka ottu
vaari anachaale kick-e kick-e
